Amid Auckland’s devastating 2023 storms, drug addict Dylan Hendriks saw opportunity to steal, destroy https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/amid-aucklands-devastating-2023-storms-drug-addict-dylan-hendriks-saw-opportunity-to-steal-destroy/XNDQOGCPO5GQLPUKB27IMHEZIA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/amid-aucklands-devastating-2023-storms-drug-addict-dylan-hendriks-saw-opportunity-to-steal-destroy/XNDQOGCPO5GQLPUKB27IMHEZIA/ Craig KapitanHe also endangered an Air NZ flight. 'The potential for catastrophe was high,' judge said. Sat, 06 Apr 2024 01:00:00 +0000 Dylan Hendriks has been sentenced to prison for the burglary of an under-construction New Lynn housing development during Cyclone Gabrielle, as well as for pointing a high-powered laser at an Air New Zealand flight and myriad other offences.

Shearing: Historic win for Wales in third shearing test https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/shearing-historic-win-for-wales-in-third-shearing-test/L2DDLSTYD5CZHNOTXFIWSV7T4U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/shearing-historic-win-for-wales-in-third-shearing-test/L2DDLSTYD5CZHNOTXFIWSV7T4U/ Wales recorded their first test win on Kiwi soil, in Te Kuiti on Friday night. Fri, 05 Apr 2024 21:11:18 +0000 Walsh shearer Gethin Lewis on the way to scoring the best quality points - a crucial factor in Wales' first shearing-test win in New Zealand, in Te Kuiti on Friday night. Former drug dealer given second chance as dealer of pre-loved goods in Duntroon https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/former-drug-dealer-given-second-chance-as-dealer-of-pre-loved-goods-in-duntroon/TOPECBMXAZGIPMOPLUSYMUCHPI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/former-drug-dealer-given-second-chance-as-dealer-of-pre-loved-goods-in-duntroon/TOPECBMXAZGIPMOPLUSYMUCHPI/ Tracy Neal'I didn't want a criminal record - I just wanted a way out for my son.' Fri, 05 Apr 2024 21:00:00 +0000 Adeena Paaske has gone from dealing cannabis to dealing second-hand goods in a business she is setting up in Duntroon, named Second Chances, after she was issued the appropriate licence on appeal.
Woolworths shuts more Lotto counters as in-store sales drop and punters buy tickets online https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woolworths-shuts-more-lotto-counters-as-in-store-sales-drop-and-punters-buy-tickets-online/YLAK3DVRXBEM7H4LITYQFFMYWQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woolworths-shuts-more-lotto-counters-as-in-store-sales-drop-and-punters-buy-tickets-online/YLAK3DVRXBEM7H4LITYQFFMYWQ/ Kirsty WynnThe drop in in-store sales and staff needed for Lotto counters has had an effect. Fri, 05 Apr 2024 21:00:00 +0000 The instantly recognisable yellow ticket may be a thing of the past with more Lotto stores closing and an increase in online sales.
New Zealand Food Safety: Value Pack, Refill Pack nut mixes recalled over toxin fears https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-zealand-food-safety-value-pack-refill-pack-nut-mixes-recalled-over-toxin-fears/F7MOABR5MRAH5KCY773D224N3E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-zealand-food-safety-value-pack-refill-pack-nut-mixes-recalled-over-toxin-fears/F7MOABR5MRAH5KCY773D224N3E/ Cherie HowieSeveral batches of nuts pulled from shelves, consumers warned. Fri, 05 Apr 2024 20:45:37 +0000 Some Value Pack products, including certain batches of its Roasted Salted Peanuts, have been recalled over toxin fears.
